entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
